mapper.select: select ta.*,area.area_name,tac.article_category_name,ts.school_name,tai.article_img_addr,tu.nick_name,tu.user_img_addr from tb_article ta left join tb_area area on ta.area_id = area.id left join tb_article_category tac on ta.article_category_id = tac.id left join tb_school ts on ta.school_id = ts.id left join tb_article_img tai on tai.article_id=ta.id left join tb_user tu on tu.id = ta.user_id where ta.id=#{id}
